DOC.brief_summary: Bread common grain product world , consumption surpass 3 billion individual per year . Sourdough whole-grain bread consider healthy alternative white , refined-wheat bread . This cross-over study test effect consumption sourdough bread compare white bread follow short dietary intervention period ( one week ) multiple clinical parameter gut microbiota .
DOC.brief_title: Testing Effect Whole-wheat Sourdough Bread Compared White Bread Healthy Individuals
DOC.criteria: Able provide sign informed consent form Over 18 year Not active military service Ability technically operate glucometer Prediagnosed type I / type II diabetes mellitus Pregnancy Usage antibiotic within three month prior participation Chronically active inflammatory neoplastic disease three year prior enrollment Skin disease , include contact dermatitis , preclude proper attachment continuous glucose monitor
